validationErrors.message: Field "testCases": Test case 1: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format
Field "testCases": Test case 2: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format

originalDocument.title: Maximize Non-Overlapping Substring Count
originalDocument.content: You are given a string s consisting of lowercase letters. Your task is to identify the maximum number of non-empty substrings in s that comply with specific criteria: Find the largest possible number of such substrings. If there are multiple solutions with the same number of substrings, choose the one with the smallest combined length. It is guaranteed that there is a unique solution for the smallest total length. The order of the returned substrings does not matter.
constraints: s contains only lowercase English letters

testCases.description: Various substrings meet the criteria: ["adefaddaccc", "adefadda", "ef", "e", "f", "ccc"]. Selecting the entire string yields only one substring. Choosing "adefadda" leaves "ccc" as non-overlapping, totaling two substrings. Since "ef" can split into two smaller parts, the optimal choice is ["e","f","ccc"] for three substrings. This selection is unique for three substrings.
Although ["d","abba","cc"] also consists of three substrings, it is invalid because it has a larger total length.
